name: Caffeine Use Disorder
chief_complaint: I can't function without multiple energy drinks daily, and I get terrible headaches when I try to stop
prognosis: Excellent with proper tapering and lifestyle adjustments, withdrawal symptoms typically resolve within 2-9 days
description: A pattern of problematic caffeine use leading to clinically significant impairment or distress, characterized by persistent desire or unsuccessful efforts to cut down use and continued use despite knowledge of physical or psychological problems caused by caffeine
